## Overview

Possible interface:

```ts
async mdankSync(files:string[] | file:string, root: string, footer: string, commonTag: 'mdank') {

}
```

Default card types:

- Basic
- Basic (and reversed card)
- Basic (optional reversed card)
- Basic (type in the answer)
- Cloze
- Image Occlusion
